1. Introduction
 Welcome to our application! By using our services, you agree to the terms outlined below.
 2. Acceptance of Terms
 When using the application, you commit to complying with all regulations and terms we set forth.
 3. Rights and Obligations
 You must not use the application for illegal purposes or to harm others.
 4. Information Privacy
 Your personal information will be protected by us and used only with your permission.
 5. Modification of Terms
 We reserve the right to update the content of these terms at any time.
 6. Contact
